'''Rongi''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|This aumaua man seems lost in thought. His clothes are neat and clean, but he's tugging on the fringe of his sash, which he's worried into a long, loose thread.

He looks up at you, his bleary eyes suddenly sharp and alert.}}
Rongi is a weaver of baskets and mats in Tikawara. He cares very little for [Tamau](/tamau/), who has been accused of stealing from the village.

At mid day, he can be found in the market near the Tikawara dock. At midnight he can be located on the shore. The rest of the time he's located inside the [Kuaru hut](/kuaruHut/).
